msbt.message: So, umremember how we talked about me moving away? Well I decided I'm gonna stay!When I told I was gonna move, they said I was CRAZY!<10_4 /> That was real nice to hear!Besidespacking up all my stuff and my snacks and my bug friends woulda been a buncha workAnyhoo, , I guess we're gonna stay neighbors!

Y'know that talk we had about me moving away? Well, umforget we ever talked about it! I kept thinking about all the fun everybody'd have without me and I got super sad.So I talked to , and they said I should stay 'cause there's snacks I can only get here!It's the little things that make someplace home, .
Um, can you please pretend we, um, never talked about me moving away?I realized there's still a buncha snacks to snack on, and spots to nap in here on ! Plus, said I gotta stay, sooooooI'm staying!

Hey, so, uhremember that talk we had about me moving away?I don't think it was real? I think, maybe, it was one of those dreams that just feels super real.If you had the same super-real dream, don't worry! I'd never leave my best snack buddy!
